Object Shape: Cigar, Cross, Sphere, Star-like, Teardrop, Other
Summary: In the sky as a star then changed shape and color
divs: Sighting DetailsLet my dog out to go to the bathroom and I noticed how clear the sky was. I noticed a bright object in the sky whic I thought at first was a star then it seemed to have tenticles drop from the mai main body. It changed color, changed shape and made the "tenticles" appear and disappear frequently. I was very happy, not concerned for my safety which I find odd.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
